remarks: Lemma for ~ rlimsqz and ~ rlimsqz2 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2016.)
statement:
rlimsqzlem.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. RR ) $.
rlimsqzlem.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. CC ) $.
rlimsqzlem.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) ~~>r D ) $.
rlimsqzlem.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
rlimsqzlem.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
rlimsqzlem.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ M <_ x ) ) -> ( abs ` ( C - E ) ) <_ ( abs ` ( B - D ) ) ) $.
rlimsqzlem $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) ~~>r E ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x $.
$d E x $.
$d M x $.
$d ph x $.
